preferences.postscript: const order = ['author', 'date', 'title', 'publisher']; const keys = Object.keys(this.has); for (const field of keys.sort((a, b) => ((order.indexOf(a) + 1) || (keys.length + 1)) - ((order.indexOf(b) + 1) || (keys.length + 1)))) { const value = this.has[field]; delete this.has[field]; this.has[field] = value; }

items.abstractNote: Voters in Switzerland overwhelmingly reject a proposal to introduce a guaranteed monthly income for all citizens.
items.title: Swiss voters say no to guaranteed free money
